core

Class UDPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.UDPServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UDPServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The UDP server, handels the connections and logic of the server
    Author:
    tom.leonardsson
